extent.charseq: California-based company, whose motto is "Don't be evil," said the cyberattacks originating from China and Web censorship demands were forcing it to review its business operations in China
Google, which announced on Tuesday it would no longer filter search results from China on its Web search engine
a "strong supporter of open Internet use"

The state-run Xinhua news agency quoted an anonymous official at the press office of the State Council, the nation's cabinet, as saying that Internet authorities were looking for clarification of Google's statement.
